numbered_ace_sentences: 1. Some students have legacy status.
2. Some students have parents whose income rank is in the top 0.1%.
3. A student with legacy status and with parents whose income rank is in the top 0.1% is 7 times as likely to be admitted to a given school as a non-legacy student who is not incredibly wealthy.
4. Some people do not have legacy status.
5. Some people are incredibly wealthy.
6. A person without legacy status and who is incredibly wealthy has a much greater advantage than a non-legacy student who has a lower income.
7. Some colleges are elite colleges.
8. Elite colleges place much emphasis on financial status.
9. I wonder why elite colleges place so much emphasis on financial status.
10. Some families are wealthy.
11. A wealthy family already has advantages in life.
12. I ask why a wealthy family should be given even more advantages in life.
13. Some people do not have a lot of money.
14. Some people have potential to be incredibly successful.
15. Some universities are prestigious universities.
16. I ask why these schools do not attempt to give opportunities to people who do not have a lot of money and who have potential to be incredibly successful.
17. Some legacy families donate large sums of money to universities.
18. If a child of a legacy family is accepted, then the legacy family continues to donate.
19. If a grandchild of a legacy family is accepted, then the legacy family continues to donate.
20. These donations provide significant benefits to a university.
21. These donations can be a reason why a university admits a legacy student.
22. A legacy student is very likely to attend the university.
23. Some parents of legacy students provide continuous donations to the university during the time of the student at the university.
24. Some parents of legacy students provide continuous donations to the university after the time of the student at the university.
25. If a university does not accept a legacy student, then the university may lose some donors.
26. Prestigious universities make incredible amounts of money from donations.
27. A prestigious university does not want to lose these funds.
